en.heroText: For a long time, hard work and innovations have given us on Saab the knowledge to make great, secure vehicles. We´re proud of our history, but maybe even more proud of our future. Now we´ll use the knowledge we´ve collected over the years to bring you Fast Security. The future electric motorcycle 1.0.
en.subHeroTitleH2: We bring you smart and beautiful interior. We also bring you top quality exterior. So, what color do you want to drive?
en.exteriorP: Your security is everything. That's why we've built the safest motorcycle ever made. At the same time we give you a bike with the most powerful electric engine.
en.interiorP: The Fast Security interior is beautiful and smart designed. Everything made for a unique driving experience with total control in your hands.
en.choseColorH3: Fast Security comes in four colors. Why not drive your personal?
en.footerTitle: Become a part of the future

sv.heroText: Many people still think Saab makes cars, and that is correct. We are on the go for the future. Saab is very much alive and well, as one of the world’s most innovative companies. And now we are proud to present our car for the future: FastSecurity, FS.
sv.subHeroTitleH2: Here are our features for the future.
sv.exteriorP: We've worked hard on every detail to make you feel special.
sv.interiorP: We've worked hard on every detail to make you feel special.
sv.choseColorH3: The bike come in four different colors.
